/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
